title: Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom 2023 Trailer Breakdown and Theories
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://joinhoney.com/kindafunny to get PayPal Honey for free.

Tim and Barrett break down the new Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom trailer to see what the game could possibly be about!

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
